issue.title: Concomitant access of a single Genomedata archive can lead to undefined behaviour

content.raw:
Please don't try to access 100s of files over SSHFS simultaneously. SSHFS won't perform for that.

Can you reproduce this on a local filesystem?

I want `chmod a-w` to make sure there are no unintentional writes, you can't know that a bug somewhere wasn't causing a write.
content.html:
Please don't try to access 100s of files over SSHFS simultaneously. SSHFS won't perform for that.

Can you reproduce this on a local filesystem?

I want chmod a-w to make sure there are no unintentional writes, you can't know that a bug somewhere wasn't causing a write.
